events.title: ARPANET Goes Live
events.description: The precursor to the Internet sends its first message.

events.title: TCP/IP Standardized (RFC 791/793)
events.description: The Internet switches to the TCP/IP protocol suite.

events.title: DNS Specification (RFC 1034/1035)
events.description: RFCs defining the Domain Name System are published.

events.title: SSL 2.0 Released
events.description: Netscape releases Secure Sockets Layer for encrypted web traffic.

events.title: RFC 2401 IPsec
events.description: IPsec is standardized to secure Internet communications.

events.title: Wi-Fi Protected Access (WPA)
events.description: WPA introduced to improve wireless network security.

events.title: RFC 6962 Certificate Transparency
events.description: Introduces logs for publicly auditable TLS certificates.

events.title: TLS 1.3 (RFC 8446)
events.description: TLS 1.3 finalized, improving performance and security.
